high_descs: Turn to your right and walk across the room to the shower, then turn left and go to the sink.
Pick up the grey spray bottle on the right, front corner of the bathroom sink.
Turn to your left and walk to the blue recycle bin, on the floor, at the left end of the counter.
Place the grey, spray bottle in the blue recycle bin, on the floor.
tasks.task_desc: Put a spray bottle in the recycle bin.

high_descs: turn right ,walk to the cabinet, turn left, walk to the toilet
grab the cleaner on the toilet
turn left, walk to the trash bin
put the cleaner in the trash bin
tasks.task_desc: move the cleaner from the toilet to the trash bin

high_descs: Walk to the sink's counter on the right.
Grab a spray bottle from the counter.
Walk to the trash bin on the left of the counter.
Place the bottle in the trash bin.
tasks.task_desc: Throw away a spray bottle.

high_descs: go forward to the left face the toilet
pick up the spray bottle that is on top of the water tank
turn to the left go to the right facing the sink
put the spray on top of the sink
turn to the right , go left turn to the right again face the toilet
pick up the other spray bottle that is on top of the water tank
turn to the left go right facing the sink
put the spray bottle on top of the sink
tasks.task_desc: put 2 spray bottles on top of the sink

high_descs: Turn to your right and face the right side of the sink counter
Pick up the dirty cloth on the sink counter
Turn left and make a step facing the sink on your right
Put the dirty cloth in the sink and rinse it
Pick up the clean cloth make a step closer the sink
Put the clean cloth the right side of the sink counter
tasks.task_desc: Put the clean cloth on the right side of sink counter

high_descs: Turn around, move to the rag on the counter.
Pick up the dirty rag on the counter.
Bring the rag to the sink on the left.
Wash the rag in the sink.
Bring the cleaned rag to the counter right of the sink.
Put the cleaned rag on the counter right of the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned rag on the counter right of the sink.

high_descs: Turn around and face the counter to the right of the sink.
Pick up the dirty white rag.
Take a step left.
Wash the rag in the sink.
Look right.
Place the rag on the counter to the right side of the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean rag on a counter.

high_descs: walk toward the sink to face the right edge of the sink
pick up the dirty white tissue from the counter to the right of the sink
put the tissue into the sink basin
wash the tissue in the sink basin, pick it up
turn slightly to the right of the sink
put the tissue on the counter to the right of the sink
tasks.task_desc: wash a dirty tissue and put it back where it was

high_descs: turn left and walk over to the bathroom sink cabinet on the right
grab the dirty towel off of the bathroom cabinet there
turn to move to the left a bit, and face the cabinet again
place the towel inside the sink and clean it off, then take it back out once it is clean
turn to move to the left a bit, and face the cabinet again
place the towel down on the cabinet on the right side
tasks.task_desc: place a clean towel on the bathroom cabinet on the right side

high_descs: Turn to the left and then right to find the sink.
Pick up the dirty cloth from the right side of the sink.
Hold the cloth and take a step to the left.
Place the cloth in the sink and turn on the water. Turn off the water and pick up the cloth.
Take the cloth and look to the left, but don't take any steps.
Place the cloth on the right side of the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Clean a cloth and place it on the sink.

high_descs: Walk right, turn left and walk to the counter
Take a toilet paper roll from the holder
Walk and turn to the right then to the left and back to the counter
Put the paper roll inside the counter drawer
Walk closer to the toilet
Take an empty toilet paper roll from the top of the toilet
Walk and turn right and left and back to the counter
Set the empty toilet paper roll and set it inside the counter drawer
tasks.task_desc: Grab the toilet paper roll, set it inside the drawer, take the empty roll and put it inside the drawer

high_descs: Turn around and walk almost to the glass wall but stop short and turn left and walk to the sink counter to the right of the sink.
Take the toilet paper of the toilet paper holder.
Back up a step and face the same way.
Open the second drawer to the left on the bottom row and put the toilet paper in it and close it.
Turn right take a step then turn left.
Take the tube off of the back of the toilet.
Go back to where you put the roll of toilet paper.
Put the tube to the right of the roll of toilet paper in a  drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a tube next to a roll of toilet paper in a drawer.

high_descs: walk over to the right side of the bathroom sink counter
grab a yellow tube off of the floor to the left of the toilet
bring the tube over to the front of the sink
put the tube inside the top right drawer of the sink cabinets
walk up to the kitchen sink cabinet on the right
grab the toilet paper off of the counter
turn around to step back a bit from the counter
open the same drawer and put the toilet paper in there too
tasks.task_desc: put the tube and the toilet paper roll in the kitchen cabinet drawer

high_descs: Walk towards the toilet and turn left to face the toilet.
Pick up the toilet paper cardboard roll in front of the plunger on the floor.
Turn left and head towards the sink on your right.
Open the top drawer on the right side of the sink and place the cardboard roll to the left of the toilet paper and close the drawer.
Look at the top counter.
Pick up the toilet paper on the counter.
Look at the sink.
Open the top drawer on the right side of the sink and place the cardboard roll to the left of the toilet paper and close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Place the toilet paper and cardboard roll in the drawer below the sink.

high_descs: Go straight, then turn left to face the counter to the right of the sink and the toilet.
Take the cardboard roll from the floor next to the plunger.
Go left to the counter to the right of the sink.
Open the most right drawer under the counter, put the cardboard roll in the upper left corner of the drawer.
Stay at the counter.
Take the toilet paper roll from the counter.
Stay at the counter.
Open the most right drawer under the counter, put the toilet paper roll to the right of the cardboard roll.
tasks.task_desc: Put toilet paper rolls in a drawer.

high_descs: turn left and walk forwards a bit, then hang a left to face the right side of the bathroom cabinet counter
grab the toilet paper roll roller off of the counter top
move to the right a bit and then face the toilet paper bar on the right side of the bathroom cabinet
place the toilet paper roll roller on the toilet paper roll holder
tasks.task_desc: place the toilet paper roll roller in the toilet paper roll holder

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the sink.
Pick up the empty roll of toilet paper from the counter.
Walk slightly to the right to the empty toilet paper holder.
Place the empty roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper holder.
tasks.task_desc: Place an empty roll of toilet paper on a toilet paper holder.

high_descs: Turn around to face the sink.
Pick up the empty toilet paper roll on the sink.
Take a step to the right and look down to focus on the plunger to the right of the sink.
Place the empty toilet paper roll on the plunger.
tasks.task_desc: To put an empty toilet paper roll onto a plunger.

high_descs: Move towards the bathroom sink
pick up the brown toilet paper roll to the left of the sink
Carry the brown toilet paper roll to the toilet
Set the empty toilet paper roll next to the plunger to the left of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Move an empty brown toilet paper roll to the plunger by the toilet

high_descs: turn right and take a step and turn left and go forward to the sink counter top
pick up the brown toilet paper roll left of the sink
turn right and go forward to the toilet and turn left
place the brown toilet paper roll on the toilet paper holder
tasks.task_desc: place the brown toilet paper roll on the toilet paper holder

high_descs: Head straight to the sink
Take the empty toilet paper tube from the counter
Turn to the right, head to the toilet
Face the toilet, put the toilet paper tube on the black holder
tasks.task_desc: Put the empty toilet paper tube from the counter onto the holder

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the roll of toilet paper on the counter.
Pick up the roll of toilet paper from the counter.
Place the roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper holder to the left of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Place a roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper holder.

high_descs: Turn around and move to the counter right of the sink.
Pick up the toilet paper on the counter.
Put the toilet paper on the holder.
tasks.task_desc: Put toilet paper on the holder.

high_descs: Turn around then head to the right side of the sink
Pick up the toilet paper that is sitting on the counter to the right of the sink
Place the toilet paper on the toilet paper roll to the right of the counter
tasks.task_desc: Put a roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper holder

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the counter.
Pick up the roll of toilet paper from the counter.
Put the roll of toilet paper on the empty toilet paper holder.
tasks.task_desc: Put a full roll of toilet paper on a toilet paper holder.

high_descs: turn to the right and take a step and turn to the right and go to the sink counter top
pick up the toilet paper from the counter top
put the toilet paper on the toilet paper holder beside the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Place toilet paper on the toilet paper holder

high_descs: Turn right and take a step forward, then turn right again and walk over to the counter.
Pick up the roll off toilet paper off of the counter to the right of the sink.
Put the roll of toilet paper onto the toilet paper holder that is attached to the counter to the left of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a toilet paper roll on the toilet paper roll holder.

high_descs: go to towel holder to the right of mirror
take white towel off of towel holder
go to sink to the left
place towel on counter to the right of sink
go to towel holder to the left of mirror
take white towel off of towel holder
go to sink to the right
place towel on counter to left of sink
tasks.task_desc: place white towel on each side of sink

high_descs: turn around and walk straight towards the mirror and look up
take the towel off the towel rack on the wall
turn left and walk straight then turn right towards the sink
put the towel down next to the sink
turn left and walk to the wall then turn right and look up
take the towel off of the towel rack on the wall
turn right and walk straight then turn left towards the sink
put the towel down on the right side of the sink counter
tasks.task_desc: remove the towels from the wall and put them on the sink counter

high_descs: Walk ahead and left to the left side of the sink.
Pick up the pink bar of soap.
Take a step right.
Wash the soap in the sink.
Look to the right.
Place the soap on the counter to the right of the sink, in front of the spray bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed bar of soap on a counter.

high_descs: Walk, then turn right to face the counter.
Pick up the bar of soap from the left of the counter.
Walk to your right to face the sink.
Wash the soap in the sink, then pick it up again.
Look to the right of the sink.
Place the soap to the right of the sink, to the left of the spray bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Place a washed bar of soap on a counter.

high_descs: Move to the far left to face the blue waste basket in the corner.
Pick up the soap from the counter top.
Move to the right to face sink.
Place the soap in the sink, fill it up with water, and remove the soap from the sink.
Continue to face the sink.
Place the bar of soap to the right of the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Place the wet soap on the counter next to the sink.

high_descs: Turn around, move to the sink on the right.
Pick up the soap on the counter, left of the sink.
Bring the soap to the sink.
Wash the soap in the sink with water.
Bring the soap to the right of the sink.
Put the soap on the counter, right of the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put cleaned soap on the counter.

high_descs: Turn around, walk a few feet, then turn right and approach the left side of the counter
Pick up the soap bar from the counter
Move a few feet right then turn back to face the sink
Rinse the soap under water in the sink then remove it
Turn left then right to face the sink again
Put the soap bar down on the counter just right of the sink
tasks.task_desc: Put the rinsed soap bar on the bathroom counter

high_descs: Turn around and then head to your right
Pick up a bar of soap off of the bathroom counter
Move to your right and then face left so you are looking at the sink
Drop the soap in the sink, run the faucet for a few seconds and then pick the bar of soap up again
Move a step to your left and face the sink again
Drop the bar of soap to the right of the sink
tasks.task_desc: Wet a bar of soap and set it on the bathroom counter

high_descs: Go to the right side of the sink cabinet.
Pick up the soap bar from the back right corner of the counter.
Take the soap to the right side of the sink.
Wash the soap bar in the sink.
Move left to the center of the sink.
Put the soap down on the counter near the right front corner of the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a rinsed bar of soap close to a bathroom sink.

high_descs: Walk to the counter to the right of the sink.
Pick up the bar of soap.
Walk to the sink to the left.
Place the soap in the sink and turn the faucet on and off before removing the soap.
Take a step back.
Place the soap on the counter to the right of the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Place a wet bar of soap on the counter to the right of the sink.

high_descs: walk to the right to face the toilet and sink
pick up the bar of soap from the counter to the right of the sink
walk left to face the bathroom sink
put the soap into the sink basin, wash with water, pick up the soap
keep facing the bathroom sink
put the soap bar on the edge of the counter to the right of the sink
tasks.task_desc: move a washed bar of soap nearer to a sink

high_descs: Go forward and then right to face the counter to the left of the sink.
Pick the soap up from the counter.
Move to the left and face the cabinets below the sink.
Open the drawer on the bottom row, second from the left and put the soap in it.
tasks.task_desc: Put soap in a drawer.

high_descs: Walk forward, then hang a right and walk up to the counter.
Pick up the bar of soap off of the counter to the left of the sink.
Turn around and walk forward, then turn right and walk up to the wall, turn right again to face the counter.
Open the second lower drawer from the left and put the bar of soap inside then close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a bar of soap in a drawer.

high_descs: walk forward, turn right to face counter
pick up the bar of soap that is on the counter
move two steps to the right
put the soap in the drawer
tasks.task_desc: move soap from counter to drawer

high_descs: walk to face toilet
pick up soap bar from toilet tank
turn left to face sink drawers
put soap in drawer
tasks.task_desc: put soap in drawer

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the white toilet ahead.
Pick up the bar of soap from the left side of the toilet tank.
Turn around, take a right and face the cabinets under the vanity to the right.
Open the second cabinet on the bottom from the right, put the bar of soap inside and close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Place a bar of soap in a drawer.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the front of the toilet.
Pick up the bar of soap from the toilet.
Take a side step to the left.
Put the bar of soap in the drawer under the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a bar of soap under the sink.

high_descs: Turn left and move to the front of the towel rack to the right of the mirror.
Pick up the towel from the rack.
Turn left and move to the front of the sink.
Place the towel in the sink.
Turn left and move to the towel rack to the left of the mirror.
Grab the towel from the rack.
Turn right and move to the front of the sink.
Put the towel in the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Place both hand towels in the sink.

high_descs: Turn left and face the counter.
Pick up the green candle.
Take a step to the right.
Place the candle on the toilet tank, in front and to the left of the toilet paper roll.
tasks.task_desc: Place a candle on a toilet tank lid.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the counter top.
Pick up the green candle from the counter.
Walk slightly to the right towards the toilet.
Put the candle on the top of the toilet, in front of and to the left of the toilet paper.
tasks.task_desc: Move a candle from a counter top to the top of a toilet.

high_descs: Turn left to the counter.
Pick the candle up off of the counter.
Turn all the way around and face the counter again.
Place the candle to the left of the toilet paper on top of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Place a candle from the counter on top of the toilet.

high_descs: Move to your right a bit until you are standing in front of the bathroom counter.
Pick up the candle that is on the counter.
Do a complete turn around until you are facing the bathroom sink and toilet once again.
Place the candle on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move a candle from the bathroom counter to the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Move to the right and face the counter to the right of the sink.
Pick the candle up from the counter.
Turn around and move a bit to the right to stand to the left of the toilet.
Put the candle on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle on a toilet.

high_descs: approach the front right side of the vanity
pick up the candle from the counter
walk the candle around the room then re-approach the counter
put the candle on the toilet tank next to the counter
tasks.task_desc: circle the room with the burning candle then put it on the back of the toilet

high_descs: Turn right and head to the sink
Pick up the candle that is sitting to the right of the faucet
Take a step backwards, then a step to your left, continue facing the sink and also the toilet
Place the candle on the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Place a candle on the back of a toilet

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the sink.
Pick up the green candle.
Take a step right.
Put the candle on the front left corner of the toilet tank.
tasks.task_desc: Place a candle on a toilet tank.

high_descs: take a few step forward and turn to the right and go to the sink
pick up the green candle form the back of the sink
turn to the right twice and take a few steps and turn to the left and take a few steps and  turn to the left facing the right of the sink
Put the green candle on the toilet tank right of the sink
tasks.task_desc: Place a green candle on the toilet tank

high_descs: Move forward, then turn left to go toward the toilet.
Pick up the bar soap from the back of the toilet.
Turn left, then turn right to face the sink.
Wash the bar soap in the sink.
Turn around, and then turn back around to face the counter, to the right of the sink.
Place the bar soap in the rightmost drawer, to the right of the toilet paper.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn and walk to the toilet.
Pick up the soap off the back of the toilet.
Turn and walk in front of the sink.
Place the soap in the sink then turn the water on then off then grab the soap again.
Turn to the door behind you, take a step back, then face the sink.
Open the drawer on the right below the sink and place the soap in it.
tasks.task_desc: Move the soap from the back of the toilet to the drawer below the sink.

high_descs: Head to the left to the toilet.
Pick up the soap on the toilet.
Bring the soap to the sink on the left.
Wet the soap in the sink.
Bring the soap to the drawer on the right of the sink.
Put the soap in that drawer right of the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put wet soap in the drawer right of the sink.

high_descs: Turn left to the vanity
Grab the white soap on the vanity
walk to the left a little
put the soap in the sink, wash it, take it out,
turn around, and turn around
put the soap in the first top drawer from the right
tasks.task_desc: wash the soap on the vanity, put it in the drawer

high_descs: Turn left to face the counter.
Pick up the soap from the counter next to the sink.
Turn left, walk forward a bit, and turn back right to face the sink.
Place the soap in the sink and get it wet.
Turn around, move forward, and turn back around to face the cabinet.
Open the topmost right drawer and place the soap inside.
tasks.task_desc: Place a wet bar of soap in the topmost right cabinet drawer.

high_descs: Turn to your left.
Pick up the soap on the counter.
Move to the left slightly to the sink.
Put the soap in the sink, get it wet, and pick it up again.
Move slightly to the right.
Open the rightmost drawer and put the soap inside.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet bar of soap in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn around and head to the counter right of the sink.
Pick up the soap on the counter.
Bring the soap to the sink.
Wet the soap in the sink with water.
Pick up the soap in the sink and bring it to the drawer on the right.
Open the drawer on the right and put the soap in the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put wet soap in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn around and face the counter.
Pick up the white bar of soap from the counter.
Take the soap and take a step to the left.
Put the soap in the sink and turn the water on. Turn the water off and pick up the soap.
Take the soap and take a step backwards.
Open the top right drawer, and put the soap inside. Close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Move a bar of soap.

high_descs: Back up, turn around to the left and walk to the sink.
Pick up the bar of soap from the counter.
Move to the left, closer to the basin.
Rinse the soap in the basin.
Open the top, right drawer on the sink vanity
Place the soap inside the drawer and close it.
tasks.task_desc: Place clean soap in a drawer.

high_descs: Move forward, then turn left to approach the counter to the left of the sink.
Pick up the rag on the counter, to the left of the sink.
Turn around, move straight, then turn around to face the drawers beneath the sink.
Open the drawer on the bottom and second to the right, and then put the rag inside.
tasks.task_desc: Put the rag in the drawer.

high_descs: turn left walk to the vanity
grab the cloth on the vanity
turn around, and turn around,
open the second from left bottom drawer, put the cloth in
tasks.task_desc: move the cloth from the vanity to the bottom drawer

high_descs: Take a tiny step forward then turn left and walk to the sink's counter.
Pick up the white wash cloth.
Take a step backwards and a tiny step left.
Open the second drawer from the left of the bottom row of drawers and put the white wash cloth in there before closing it.
tasks.task_desc: Put a white wash cloth in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the toilet then turn left.
Pick up the cloth that's on the back of the toilet.
Take a step backwards.
Put the cloth in the second drawer from the left on the bottom row.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cloth in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn right and take two steps then turn left.
Pick up the white cloth that is on the top of the toilet.
Turn around and take one step, then turn around and open the bottom drawer underneath the sink.
Place the white cloth in the drawer and then close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: To put away the white cloth.

high_descs: Turn right and walk over to the toilet
Pick up the white cloth from the top of the toilet
Move a few feet left then turn back right toward the bathroom sink
Open the bottom drawer below the sink and put the cloth in it
tasks.task_desc: Put the white cloth in the bathroom drawer

high_descs: Take a small step forward then turn left and walk to the sink.
Pick up the bar of soap that's in front of you in the sink.
Take a step backwards so you can use the drawer.
Open the drawer under the sink all the way to the right and put the soap in there then close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a bar of soap in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn to the left and face the sink.
Pick the soap up from the sink.
Move to the right to face the top drawer to the right of the sink.
Put the soap in the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put soap in a drawer.

high_descs: Walk to the sink to your left.
Grab the soap in the sink.
Walk to the drawer that's to the right of the sink.
Place the soap inside the drawer and close it.
tasks.task_desc: Place soap inside the drawer to the right of the sink.

high_descs: Turn around and move to the toilet.
Pick up the wash rag that's on the back of the toilet.
Move a few steps to the left to the vanity.
Put the wash rag in the second from the right bottom drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wash rag in a drawer under the sink.

high_descs: Turn around and head towards the toilet to your left.
Pick up the towel on the toilet basin.
Look at the drawer below the sink.
Open the drawer, place the towel in it, and close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Place the towel from the toilet basin into the drawer.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the toilet on the right.
Pick up the cloth rag from the top of the toilet.
Walk slightly to the left towards the sink.
Open the drawer on the right below the sink and put the cloth rag in it, then close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Move a cloth rag from the top of a toilet to a drawer.
